entry.title: Israeli Troops Raid Main Gaza Hospital in Search of Militants and Hostages
entry.content: Israel said it found weapons and other evidence that militants had been operating inside the Al-Shifa hospital compound, a claim that Hamas has disputed.

entry.title: U.S. Presses for Gaza Hostages' Release as Fears Grow Over Their Safety
entry.content: The regional visit is part of the Biden administration’s efforts to prevent Israel’s conflict with Hamas from spiraling into a regional war.
